root.name: Ramp Champ
root.description: Ramp Champ is a carnival-themed skee-ball type game. Gameplay Ramp Champ is played by flicking your finger to throw a ball at various targets. Targets are worth variable amounts of points, and oftentimes hitting a target will reveal another one. Each ramp also has three goals that can be accomplished by hitting certain targets, or gaining a certain number of points. Completing a goal awards you a trophy which can be viewed in your trophy case. There are three for each lever: bronze, silver, and gold. Ramps Ramp Champ comes with four ramps, and four more ramps can be downloaded in packs of two for 99¢.
